channel.title: Adding projectiles to rune c'bow's attack?
channel.description: How can I add projectiles to rune c'bow's attack. Like make it need arrows and then show them shooting it?

item.title: Adding projectiles to rune c'bow's attack?
item.dc:creator: @Killer-99-pkz Killer-99-pkz
item.description:
@Killer-99-pkz wrote:

Use comon Sence, find a bow that works example: 859 (Magic Longbow). go download WindowsGrep i will not find the link thats your job. or just search all your java files for the item id where you see it add the code for the c bow EX: 15156 (Dark Bow) or Ex: 13800 (Rc Bow).

Read full topic
item.source: Adding projectiles to rune c'bow's attack?
